title: Nominations Sent to the Senate | The White House
content: Edgard D. Kagan, of Virginia, a Career Member of the Senior Foreign Service, Class of Minister-Counselor, to be Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of the United States of America to Malaysia.     Steven L. Swig, of California, to be a Member of the Board of Directors of the Millennium Challenge Corporation for a term of three years, vice George M. Marcus, term expired.# # #
